text: Jisa dina uha tuhanu sari'am nu ki'amata de dina ikatha karega, iha hi dina jita-hara da hovega. Ate jihara bada alaha te imana li'a'i'a hovega ate usa ne cage karama kite honage. Alaha usa de papa usa tom dura kara devega. Ate usa nu ajihe bagam vica dakhila karega, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am ate uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Iha hai vadi safalata
